trans-unit.source: Represents a property stored in a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示存储在一个属性<xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A StylusPointProperty represents properties in <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> such as the (x, y) coordinates, pressure, and so on.
trans-unit.target: StylusPointProperty 代表中的属性<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>如 （x，y） 坐标、 压力，依次类推。</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>

trans-unit.source: You can inherit from the StylusPointProperty class to customize the information stored for each property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以继承 StylusPointProperty 类自定义为每个属性存储的信息。

trans-unit.source: The Windows Presentation Framework ships with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo> class that inherits from StylusPointProperty and specifies the minimum and maximum values, resolution, and unit used for each property.
trans-unit.target: Windows Presentation Framework 附带<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>类，该类继承自 StylusPointProperty 并指定最小和最大值、 分辨率和用于每个属性的单元。</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointPropertyInfo>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref> class, copying the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref>类，复制指定<xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref> class using the specified GUID.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref>类使用指定的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the property represents a button on the stylus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要指示该属性表示触笔; 上的按钮否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the GUID for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref>.
Gets whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref> represents a button on the stylus.
trans-unit.target: 获取是否<xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref>表示触笔上的按钮。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref> represents a button on the stylus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPointProperty"></xref>表示触笔; 上的按钮否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the current object.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示当前对象的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current object.
trans-unit.target: 表示当前对象的字符串。
